legal_basis: section 97 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
risk_of_persecution: fear of persecution by the Lavalas Party in Haiti
decision_reasoning: Board's decision was reasonable and within the range of acceptable outcomes
evidence_assessment: lack of evidence and time elapsed since persecution
documentary evidence showed risks were generalized, not particularized
conclusion_outcome: application for judicial review was dismissed
result_of_case: Court dismissed the application, upholding the Board's decision
